subdisciplines.name: Masculinity and Literature
subdisciplines.description: The study of masculinity in literature, including how it is represented and constructed.

subdisciplines.name: Masculinity and Media
subdisciplines.description: The study of masculinity in media, including how it is represented and constructed in film, television, and advertising.

subdisciplines.name: Men's Health
subdisciplines.description: The study of men's health issues and how masculinity impacts men's health outcomes.
